---
name: confluence-fetch
description: Guide for fetching information from confluence page(s). Use this when asked about fetch something in confluence
---

To fetch information from confluence, follow this process, using tools provided in the `tools` folder.

1. Load in authentication information from the `.env` file.
2. Use `confluence_fetch` tool to get information from given page or pages.
3. Verify the information is correct by asking user about page title or chapters in page.
